requirements.requirement_text: "The system used in the composition of the ValueSet is 'http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/CodeSystem/EndpointPayloadTypeCS'"
"The concept code used in the composition of the ValueSet is 'NA'"
"id" SHALL be a unique identifier for the organization affiliation.
"meta" SHALL include "lastUpdated" with a timestamp of the most recent update.
"active" SHOULD be set to indicate if the organization affiliation is active.
"network" SHALL reference any networks the organization is part of.
"code" SHALL include the coding system for the organization affiliation role.
"location" SHOULD reference the location of the organization.
"healthcareService" SHOULD reference the healthcare services provided by the organization.
"Select OrganizationAffiliations associated with the specified specialty"

requirements.requirement_text: "The 'platinum' code display is 'Platinum-QHP' and its definition is 'Plan with highest monthly premium and lowest costs when you need care\tA Qualified Health Plan with the highest monthly premiums and smallest out-of-pocket costs for the member in comparison to other metal-category plans'."

"The 'gold' code display is 'Gold-QHP' and its definition is 'Plan with high monthly premium and low costs when you need care\tA Qualified Health Plan with the higher monthly premiums and smaller out-of-pocket costs for the member in comparison to other metal-category plans'."

"The 'silver' code display is 'Silver-QHP' and its definition is 'Plan with moderate monthly premium and moderate costs when you need care\tA Qualified Health Plan with the lower monthly premiums and larger out-of-pocket costs for the member in comparison to other metal-category plans'."

"The 'bronze' code display is 'Bronze-QHP' and its definition is 'Plan with lowest monthly premium and highest costs when you need care\tA Qualified Health Plan with the lowest monthly premiums and largest out-of-pocket costs for the member in comparison to other metal-category plans'."

"The 'catastrophic' code display is 'Catastrophic-QHP' and its definition is 'A plan with low monthly premiums and very high deductibles and are available only to those under 30 or with certain special exemptions.'."

"The 'lowdeductible' code display is 'Low Deductible' and its definition is 'A plan that requires the insured to pay out of pocket a smaller proportion of incurred health care costs than a traditional insurance plan.'."

"The 'highdeductible' code display is 'High Deductible' and its definition is 'A plan that requires the insured to pay out of pocket a larger proportion of incurred health care costs than a traditional insurance plan.'."

"The 'catastrophicplan' code display is 'Catastrophic Plan' and its definition is 'A plan that requires the insured to pay out of pocket a much larger proportion of incurred health care costs than a traditional insurance plan.'."
"description: Select PractitionerRoles with the specified role"

requirements.source: JSON content, code/coding/system and code/coding/code elements

requirements.requirement_text: "id" field SHALL be present in the FHIR resource
"meta" containing "lastUpdated" and "profile" fields SHALL be present in the FHIR resource
"active" field SHALL be set to true
The "code" array SHALL contain a "coding" array with a "system" and "code" fields

"Organization" resource SHALL contain a "meta" field with a "lastUpdated" timestamp and a "profile" array with at least one URL (e.g., "http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/StructureDefinition/plannet-Organization").
"Organization" resource SHALL contain a "language" field with a language code (e.g., "en-US").
"Organization" resource SHALL contain an "identifier" array with at least one identifier object, which contains a "system" URL and a "value" (e.g., "NPI78").
"Organization" resource SHALL contain an "active" field, which indicates whether the organization is active (e.g., true).
"Organization" resource SHALL contain a "type" array with at least one type object, which contains "coding" that includes a "system" URL, a "code", and a "display" name (e.g., "Facility").
"Organization" resource SHALL contain a "name" field with the name of the organization (e.g., "Hamilton Clinic").

"Organization" resource SHALL contain a "telecom" array with at least one telecom object, which contains a "system" (e.g., "phone", "url"), a "value" (e.g., "(111)-222-3333", "https://www.hartfordgeneralhospital.com"), and a "rank".
"Organization" resource SHALL contain an "address" array with at least one address object, which includes fields for "line", "city", "state", and "postalCode".
"Organization" resource MAY contain a "partOf" field with a "reference" to another organization (e.g., "Organization/Hospital").
"Organization" resource MAY contain a "contact" array with at least one contact object, which contains a "telecom" array similar to the root "telecom" array described above.
"The id SHALL be unique among all 'Organization' resources"
"The 'meta' field SHALL contain 'lastUpdated' and 'profile' fields with appropriate values"
"The 'language' field SHALL indicate the language of the resource"
"The 'active' field SHALL indicate the active status of the organization"
"The 'type' field SHALL include a coding system, code, and display"
"The 'name' field SHALL contain the name of the organization"
"The 'partOf' field SHALL indicate the parent organization, if any"
"The 'contact' field SHALL include name and telecom information for the organization contact"
"date" should be formatted as per ISO 8601 date-time format
"publisher" should be "HL7 Financial Management Working Group"
"description" should be "Individual and Group Specialties from National Uniform Claim Committee (NUCC) Health Care Provider Taxonomy code set."
"jurisdiction" coding "system" should be "urn:iso:std:iso:3166" and "code" should be "US"
"The 'active' field should be a boolean value."
"The 'code' field should contain coding from 'Provider Role Codes'."
"Select Practitioners with the specified given name"
"description: Select products with the specified identifier"

requirements.requirement_text: "meta" field SHALL contain a "lastUpdated" field with a timestamp value
"meta" field SHALL contain a "profile" field with a URL value
"type" field SHALL contain a "coding" field with a "system" and "code" values
"telecom" field SHALL contain a "system" and "value" fields with appropriate values
"address" field SHALL contain "line", "city", "state", and "postalCode" fields with appropriate values
"position" field SHALL contain "longitude" and "latitude" fields with appropriate values
"managingOrganization" field SHALL contain "reference" field with appropriate value
"hoursOfOperation" field SHALL contain "daysOfWeek" and "allDay" fields with appropriate values
"The 'Endpoint.status' element SHALL have a fixed code of 'active'."

"The 'Endpoint.managingOrganization' element SHALL be supported and its type SHALL be 'Reference' with the target profile 'http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/StructureDefinition/plannet-Organization'."
"The 'Endpoint.contact' element and its sub-elements 'Endpoint.contact.system' and 'Endpoint.contact.value' SHALL be supported."
"The 'Endpoint.payloadType' element SHALL have a maximum cardinality of 1 and SHALL be supported."

"Interact with the server interface using FHIR's RESTful interface. For details on its version/capabilities you should connect the value in Endpoint.address and retrieve the FHIR CapabilityStatement."
requirements.source: resourceType: ValueSet, id: MinEndpointConnectionTypeVS, concept.code: hl7-fhir-rest

requirements.requirement_text: "Use the servers FHIR Messaging interface. Details can be found on the messaging.html page in the FHIR Specification. The FHIR server's base address is specified in the Endpoint.address property."

requirements.requirement_text: "Interact with a FHIR server interface using FHIR's RESTful interface using an operation other than messaging. For details on its version/capabilities you should connect the value in Endpoint.address and retrieve the FHIR CapabilityStatement."
requirements.source: resourceType: ValueSet, id: MinEndpointConnectionTypeVS, concept.code: hl7-fhir-opn

requirements.requirement_text: "Interact with a server using HTTP/REST but not FHIR.  Should be used for web portals."
requirements.source: resourceType: ValueSet, id: MinEndpointConnectionTypeVS, concept.code: rest-non-fhir

requirements.requirement_text: "Select Locations managed by the specified organization"
"jurisdiction: United States of America [...] code: US"
"The status of the SearchParameter resource is 'active'."
"The base of the SearchParameter resource is 'Organization'."
"The type of the SearchParameter resource is 'token'."
"The expression of the SearchParameter resource is 'Organization.type'."
"The SearchParameter resource supports multiple OR ('multipleOr': true)."
"The SearchParameter resource supports multiple AND ('multipleAnd': true)."
"The CodeSystem resource MUST have a status of 'active'."
requirements.source: Resource Type: CodeSystem, ID: LanguageProficiencyCS, Element: status

requirements.requirement_text: "The CodeSystem resource MAY include a 'publisher' element, and if present, it SHALL be 'HL7 Financial Management Working Group'."
requirements.source: Resource Type: CodeSystem, ID: LanguageProficiencyCS, Element: publisher

requirements.requirement_text: "The CodeSystem resource SHALL include a 'content' element with a value of 'complete'."
requirements.source: Resource Type: CodeSystem, ID: LanguageProficiencyCS, Element: content

requirements.requirement_text: "The CodeSystem resource SHALL include a 'count' element with a value of '6'."
requirements.source: Resource Type: CodeSystem, ID: LanguageProficiencyCS, Element: count

requirements.requirement_text: The "id" element SHALL be a string.
The "meta" element SHALL contain a "lastUpdated" field with a valid timestamp.
The "meta" element SHALL contain a "profile" field with "http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/StructureDefinition/plannet-Organization".
The "active" element SHALL be a boolean.
The "name" element SHALL be a string.
The "telecom" element SHALL contain a "system" field with a string value and a "value" field with a string value.
The "address" element SHALL contain "line", "city", "state", and "postalCode" fields with string values.
"An element representing the days and times a contact point is available"
"The 'daysOfWeek' extension must have a value of type 'code'"
"The 'allDay' extension must have a value of type 'boolean'"
"The 'availableStartTime' extension must have a value of type 'time'"
"The 'availableEndTime' extension must have a value of type 'time'"
"\"description\": Select roles offered by the specified organization"
"All codes in this table are from the system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/CodeSystem/DeliveryMethodCS"
"ValueSet resource should have a 'status' field with value 'active'"
"ValueSet resource should have a 'publisher' field with value 'HL7 Financial Management Working Group'"
"The server SHALL support the search operation for the Patient resource."
"The server SHALL support the _id search parameter for the Patient resource."

requirements.source: contains array in the expansion attribute in the given FHIR resource

requirements.requirement_text: "Select Practitioners with the specified family name"
"id" attribute SHALL be present and unique within the context of the system
"type" attribute SHALL include a valid "coding" attribute
"telecom" attribute SHALL include valid "extension", "system", "value", and "rank" attributes
"address" attribute SHALL include valid "line", "city", "state", and "postalCode" attributes
"position" attribute SHALL include valid "longitude" and "latitude" attributes
"managingOrganization" attribute SHALL include a valid "reference" attribute
"hoursOfOperation" attribute SHALL include valid "daysOfWeek", "allDay", "openingTime", and "closingTime" attributes
"id" SHALL be a unique identifier for the location
"name" SHALL be the name of the location
"address" SHALL contain address details of the location
"position" SHALL contain longitude and latitude details of the location
"managingOrganization" SHALL contain a reference to the managing organization
"telecom" SHALL contain contact details of the location
"hoursOfOperation" SHALL contain details of the days and hours of operation
"publisher" SHALL be "HL7 Financial Management Working Group"
"description" SHALL be "A distinct package of health insurance coverage benefits that are offered using a particular product network type."
"jurisdiction" SHALL be provided and coding system SHALL be "urn:iso:std:iso:3166" and code SHALL be "US"
"The 'description' of the resource is 'Select OrganizationAffiliations with the specified role'"

"InsurancePlan describes a health insurance offering comprised of a list of covered benefits (i.e. the product), costs associated with those benefits (i.e. the plan), and additional information about the offering, such as who it is owned and administered by, a coverage area, contact information, etc."
"The resourceType is 'StructureDefinition', the id is 'plannet-InsurancePlan', and the url is 'http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/StructureDefinition/plannet-InsurancePlan'."
"The 'version' is '1.1.0', the 'name' is 'PlannetInsurancePlan', and the 'status' is 'active'."

"The 'kind' is 'resource', the 'abstract' is false, the 'type' is 'InsurancePlan', the 'baseDefinition' is 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/InsurancePlan', and the 'derivation' is 'constraint'."
"The id of the SearchParameter SHALL be 'practitionerrole-endpoint'"
"The url of the SearchParameter SHALL be 'http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/SearchParameter/practitionerrole-endpoint'"
"The name of the SearchParameter SHALL be 'Plannet_sp_practitionerrole_endpoint'"
"The status of the SearchParameter SHALL be 'active'"
"The target of the SearchParameter SHALL be 'Endpoint'"
"The SearchParameter SHALL support multiple OR logic"
"The SearchParameter SHALL support multiple AND logic"
"The chain of the SearchParameter SHALL be 'organization'"
"The system SHALL support the 'AcceptingPatientsCS' CodeSystem with version '1.1.0'"
requirements.source: CodeSystem section in the FHIR Implementation Guide

requirements.requirement_text: "The system SHALL provide a search parameter 'Plannet_sp_healthcareservice_location' with version '1.1.0'"
requirements.source: SearchParameter section in the FHIR Implementation Guide

requirements.requirement_text: "Each Insurance plan should be searchable by who it's administered by (id: insuranceplan-administered-by), coverage area (id: insuranceplan-coverage-area), identifier (id: insuranceplan-identifier), name (id: insuranceplan-name), who it's owned by (id: insuranceplan-owned-by), plan type (id: insuranceplan-plan-type), and type (id: insuranceplan-type)."
requirements.source: JSON Content, resource type: SearchParameter, elements: insuranceplan-administered-by, insuranceplan-coverage-area, insuranceplan-identifier, insuranceplan-name, insuranceplan-owned-by, insuranceplan-plan-type, insuranceplan-type.

requirements.requirement_text: "Each Location should be searchable by its address (id: location-address), address city (id: location-address-city), address postal code (id: location-address-postalcode), address state (id: location-address-state), endpoint (id: location-endpoint), and organization (id: location-organization)."
requirements.source: JSON Content, resource type: SearchParameter, elements: location-address, location-address-city, location-address-postalcode, location-address-state, location-endpoint, location-organization.

requirements.requirement_text: The system SHALL support the SearchParameter 'practitioner-given-name' with the specified url and version.
The system SHALL support the StructureDefinition 'accessibility' with the specified url and version.
The system SHALL support the StructureDefinition 'communication-proficiency' with the specified url and version.
"Select PractitionerRoles available at the specified location"
"chain: address, address-postalcode, address-city, address-state, organization, type"

requirements.requirement_text: "The code 'tdd' corresponds to 'Telecommunications Device for the Deaf'"
"The code 'web' corresponds to 'Website accessed through browser'"
The "description" field should allow the selection of insurance plans of the specified type.
The "type" field should be set to "token".
The "expression" field should be set to "InsurancePlan.type".
"When the contact is a department name, rather than a human (e.g., patient help line), include a blank family and given name, and provide the department name in contact.name.text"
requirements.conditional: True (When the contact is a department name)

requirements.requirement_text: "The 'type' field of the 'StructureDefinition' resource should be 'Organization'."
"The 'baseDefinition' field of the 'StructureDefinition' resource should be 'http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-organization'"
"The 'derivation' field of the 'StructureDefinition' resource should be 'constraint'"
"id" SHALL be populated with a unique identifier for the practitioner.
"meta" SHALL be populated with lastUpdated time and profile information.
"language" SHALL be set to the language used within the resource.
"identifier" SHALL include a system and value, where system is "http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/us-npi" and value is the NPI number.
"active" SHALL be set to true if the practitioner is active.
"name" SHALL include the full name of the practitioner.
"qualification" SHOULD be populated with the practitioner's qualifications, including status, where valid, code, and issuer.
"Extension.extension:status: a minimum of 1 and a maximum of 1 is required. This element must be supported."

"Extension.extension:status.valueCode: The minimum is 1, the maximum is 1, the fixedCode is 'active', and binding strength is 'required'. The valueSet is 'http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/ValueSet/QualificationStatusVS'."
"Extension.extension:whereValid: The minimum is 0, the maximum is '*', and this element must be supported."

"Extension.extension:whereValid.value[x]: The minimum is 1. The type of the value[x] can be a 'CodeableConcept' or a 'Reference' with the targetProfile 'http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/StructureDefinition/plannet-Location'."
"The 'chain' of the resource must support 'type', 'address', and 'organization'"
"Select HealthcareServices providing the specified category of services"
"description: Select OrganizationAffiliations with the specified endpoint"
"id" field should be populated with a unique identifier
"meta" field should be populated with "lastUpdated" and "profile" fields. "lastUpdated" should contain the date and time of the last update. "profile" should contain a link to the profile structure.
"language" field should be populated with the language code "en-US"
"text" field should contain a "status" field set to "extensions" and a "div" field containing narrative in HTML format

"extension" field should contain a "url" field set to "http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/StructureDefinition/network-reference", and a "valueReference" field containing the network reference.
"active" field should be set to true indicating the practitioner is active.
"organization" field should be populated with the reference to the organization.
"code" field should be populated with the role of the practitioner.
"specialty" field should be populated with the specialty of the practitioner.
"The 'version' field must contain a version number."
"The 'date' field must contain a timestamp in the format 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS+00:00'."
"The 'publisher' field must contain the value 'HL7 Financial Management Working Group'."
"The 'jurisdiction' field should have a 'coding' array that contains an object with 'system' and 'code' fields, where 'system' is 'urn:iso:std:iso:3166' and 'code' is 'US'."
"If no new patients are accepted, no characteristics are allowed"
"The value of Extension.extension:acceptingPatients should be a CodeableConcept"
"The value of Extension.extension:fromNetwork should be a Reference to the Network StructureDefinition"
"The value of Extension.extension:characteristics should be a string"
"id" SHALL be assigned a unique string value
"meta" SHALL have a "lastUpdated" field with a timestamp value
"meta" SHALL have a "profile" field with an array containing at least the value "http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/StructureDefinition/plannet-Location"
"name" SHALL be assigned a string value
"type" SHALL have a "coding" field with an array containing at least one object with a "system" of "http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode" and a "code" of "HOSP"
"telecom" SHALL be an array containing at least one object with a "system" of "phone" and a "value" of a valid phone number
"address" SHALL be an object with a "line" field containing an array with at least one string, a "city" field with a string, a "state" field with a string, and a "postalCode" field with a string
"position" SHALL be an object with a "longitude" field and a "latitude" field, both with numeric values
"managingOrganization" SHALL be an object with a "reference" field containing a string
"hoursOfOperation" SHALL be an array containing at least one object with a "daysOfWeek" field, containing an array with at least one string

requirements.conditional: True (if there are any additional elements to be added to the resource)
True (if the HealthcareService resource has a specialty)

requirements.requirement_text: "The `id` field SHALL be populated with a unique identifier."
"The `status` SHALL be populated and can only be `active`."
"The `type` field SHALL be populated with a `coding` object that includes `system`, `code`, and `display` fields."
"The `telecom` field SHALL be populated with a `system` and `value`."
"The `address` field SHALL be populated with `line`, `city`, `state`, and `postalCode`."
"The `position` field SHALL be populated with `longitude` and `latitude`."
"The `managingOrganization` field SHALL be populated with a `reference`."
"The `hoursOfOperation` field SHALL be populated with `daysOfWeek`, `allDay` (for weekdays), `openingTime` and `closingTime` (for weekends)."
requirements.conditional: True (Different fields required for weekdays and weekends)

"The code 'ntwk' should be included in the 'ValueSet'"

requirements.requirement_text: "A conformant Plan-Net service **SHALL NOT** require a directory mobile application to send consumer identifying information in order to query content."
"A directory mobile application **SHALL NOT** send consumer identifiable information when querying a Plan-Net service."
"Health Plan API actors **SHALL** be capable of populating all Must Support data elements as part of the query results."

"In situations where information on a particular Must Support data element is not present and the minimum cardinality is 0 , the Health Plan API actors **SHALL NOT** include the data elements in the resource instance returned as part of the query results."
requirements.conditional: True (when information on a particular Must Support data element is not present and the minimum cardinality is 0)

requirements.requirement_text: "In situations where information on a particular data element is not present and the minimum cardinality is >0 **SHALL** send the reason for the missing information using values (such as nullFlavors) from the value set where they exist or use the dataAbsentReason extension."
requirements.conditional: True (when information on a particular data element is not present and the minimum cardinality is >0)

requirements.requirement_text: "Application actors **SHALL** be capable of processing resource instances containing the Must Support data elements without generating an error or causing the application to fail."
"Application actors **SHOULD** be capable of displaying the data elements for human use or storing the information for other purposes."
"When querying Health Plan API actors, Application actors **SHALL** interpret missing Must Support data elements within resource instances as data not present in the Health Plan API actors system."
requirements.conditional: True (when querying Health Plan API actors)

requirements.requirement_text: "Consumer App actors **SHALL** be able to process resource instances containing Must Support data elements asserting missing information."
"If no period is provided, then it is assumed the role is active with no expiration date."
"HealthcareService category, specialty, and type fields are the highest level of organization of the services provided by the provider's network."
"All organizations that provide service should define an appropriate set of HealthcareServices to facilitate search."
"HealthcareServices are typically provided by an organization, except in the case of a Practitioner that is not associated with an organization"
"The Practitioner resource SHALL include valid references to the individual practitioner."
"An organization is a formal or informal grouping of people or organizations with a common purpose, such as a company, institution, corporation, community group, or healthcare practice."

"The OrganizationAffiliation resource describes relationships between two or more organizations, including the services one organization provides another, the location(s) where they provide services, the availability of those services, electronic endpoints, and other relevant information."
"Practitioner is a person who is directly or indirectly involved in the provisioning of healthcare."
"Change Organization.type binding from OrganizationType to NetworkType"
"Ability to manage Provider Directory List for incoming/outgoing providers"

requirements.source: HL7 Financial Management Working Group, Package hl7.fhir.us.davinci-pdex-plan-net#1.1.0 based on FHIR 4.0.1

requirements.requirement_text: "Select HealthcareServices providing the specified category of services"
"Select services associated with the specified specialty"
"Select products that are administered by the specified organization"
"Select products that are offered in the specified location"
"Select products that are owned by the specified organization"
"Select insurance plans of the specified type"
"Select Locations managed by the specified organization"
"Select Locations that are part of the specified location"
"Select organizations with the specified address (matches any of the string elements of an address)"
"Select Organizations that are part of the specified organization"
"Select OrganizationAffiliations available at the specified location"
"Select roles where the organization is a member of the specified health insurance provider network"
"Select roles filled by the specified organization"
"Select roles offered by the specified organization"
"Select OrganizationAffiliations associated with the specified specialty"
"Select Practitioners with the specified family name"
"Select Practitioners with the specified given name"
"Select Practitioners with the specified name (matches against any of the elements in the HumanName data type)"

"The resource may be used to encompass a variety of services covering the entire healthcare spectrum, including promotion, prevention, diagnostics, pharmacy, hospital and ambulatory care, home care, long-term care, and other health-related and community services."
"An InsurancePlan is a discrete package of health insurance coverage benefits that are offered under a particular network type."
"A plan pairs a product’s covered benefits with the particular cost sharing structure offered to a consumer."

"InsurancePlan describes a health insurance offering comprised of a list of covered benefits (i.e. the product), costs associated with those benefits (i.e. the plan), and additional information about the offering, such as who it is owned and administered by, a coverage area, contact information, etc."
"A Location is the physical place where healthcare services are provided, practitioners are employed, organizations are based, etc."
"Locations can range in scope from a room in a building to a geographic region/area."
"Practitioner participation in healthcare provider insurance networks may be direct or through their role at an organization."
"An extension to describe accessibility options offered by a practitioner or at a location."
"An extension to express a practitioner’s spoken proficiency with the language indicated in practitioner.communication."
"An extension representing the days and times a contact point is available."
"An extension describing the service delivery method. If service delivery is virtual, one or more delivery modalities should be specified."
"EndpointUseCase is an enumeration of the specific use cases (service descriptions) supported by the endpoint."
"A reference to the healthcare provider insurance networks (plannet-Network) the practitioner participates in through their role"
"New Patients indicates whether new patients are being accepted in general, or from a specific network."
"An extension to provide a human-readable description of an organization."
"An extension to add status and whereValid elements to a practitioner’s qualifications."
"An extension to add qualifications for an organization (e.g. accreditation) or practitionerRole (e.g. registered to prescribe controlled substances)."
"A reference to an alternative point of contact (plannet-PractitionerRole, plannet-Organization, plannet-OrganizationAffiliation, or plannet-Location) for this organization"
requirements.note: The actual content of the FHIR Implementation Guide was not provided so the analysis is based on the provided descriptions.

requirements.requirement_text: "Codes for documenting spoken language proficiency based on the Interagency Language Roundtable scale of abilities to communicate in a language (Language Proficiency VS)."
"Minimum Endpoint Connection Types (Minimum Endpoint Connection Types VS)."
"Non-Individual Specialties from National Uniform Claim Committee (NUCC) Health Care Provider Taxonomy code set (Non-Individual Specialties)."
"Codes to identify if the practice is accepting new patients"
"Endpoint Payload Types are constrained to NA (Not Applicable) as part of this IG"
"Broad categories of healthcare services being performed or delivered"
"A distinct package of health insurance coverage benefits that are offered using a particular product network type."
"Burr Clinic shall provide service to Hartford Hospital"
"Burr Clinic shall have an affiliation with Acme of CT Provider Network and Hartford General Hospital"
"Hartford Orthopedic Services affiliation with Acme of CT Provider Network and Hartford General Hospital"

"Publication of this data through a standard FHIR-based API will enable third parties to develop applications through which consumers and providers can query the participants in a payer’s network that may provide services that address their health care needs."
requirements.source: Introduction paragraph of the Implementation Guide

requirements.requirement_text: "The PDEX Payer Network (or Plan-Net) Implementation Guide is based conceptually on the [Validated Healthcare Directory Implementation Guide (VHDir IG)](http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/2018Sep/index.html), an international standard."
requirements.source: Second paragraph of the Implementation Guide

requirements.requirement_text: "The use of VhDir as the conceptual base for the profiles and extensions in the PDEX Payer Network Implementation Guide is intended to protect implementers of the Plan-Net IG from rework/remapping when the VHDir concept reaches implementation, and becomes a source of data for the PDEX Payer Network."
requirements.source: Third paragraph of the Implementation Guide

requirements.requirement_text: "The primary changes from the VHDir IG are to: 1. remove the validation and restriction resources"
requirements.source: Third paragraph of the Implementation Guide

requirements.requirement_text: "Provider directories play a critical role in enabling identification of individual providers and provider organizations, as well as characteristics about them."

"Find provider accessibility information (specialty, office hours, languages spoken, taking patients) - enables individuals and consumers to find contact and other accessibility information for individual healthcare providers and/or healthcare organizations"

"Relationship between provider and insurance plan (insurance accepted) or plan and provider (network) - enables individual healthcare providers, organizations, and payers to discover the relationships between providers, organizations, and payers, as well as additional details about the relationships and entities involved"

"Enable electronic exchange (e.g. discovery of electronic endpoints such as IHE/EHR endpoints, FHIR server URLs, Direct addresses) - enables the electronic exchange of health information by supporting the ability to discover electronic service information including electronic endpoints or electronic addresses"

"Find an individual and/or organization (even if no electronic endpoint is available) - enables users to find contact and other identifying information about healthcare organizations and individual healthcare providers"
"Support forward and reverse chaining on all search parameters that specify the 'chain' property."
"Support xml source formats for all Plan-Net interactions."
"A server SHALL reject any unauthorized requests by returning an HTTP 401 unauthorized response code."
"Support the following search parameters for the Endpoint resource: organization, _id, _lastUpdated"
"Support the following search parameters for the HealthcareService resource: location, coverage-area, organization, endpoint, name, service-category, service-type, specialty, _id, _lastUpdated"
"Support the following search parameters for the InsurancePlan resource: administered-by, owned-by, coverage-area, name, plan-type, identifier, _id, _lastUpdated, type"
"Support the following search parameters for the Location resource: partof, organization, endpoint, address-city, address-state, address-postalcode, address, type, _id, _lastUpdated"
"Plan-Net OrganizationAffiliation must include primary-organization, participating-organization, location, service, network, endpoint, role, specialty, _id, _lastUpdated"
requirements.source: OrganizationAffiliation section in the FHIR Implementation Guide

requirements.requirement_text: "Plan-Net Practitioner must include name, _id, _lastUpdated, family, given"
requirements.source: Practitioner section in the FHIR Implementation Guide

requirements.requirement_text: "Plan-Net PractitionerRole must include practitioner, organization, location, service, network, endpoint, role, specialty, _id, _lastUpdated"
requirements.source: PractitionerRole section in the FHIR Implementation Guide
Endpoint section in the FHIR Implementation Guide
Endpoint section in the FHIR Implementation Guide

requirements.requirement_text: "A Server SHOULD be capable of returning a Endpoint resource using: GET [base]/Endpoint/[id]/_history/vid"
"A Server SHALL be capable of supporting the following _includes: Endpoint:organization - GET [base]/Endpoint?[parameter=value]&_include=Endpoint:organization"
"A Server SHALL be capable of returning a HealthcareService resource using: GET [base]/HealthcareService/[id]"
"A Server SHOULD be capable of returning a HealthcareService resource using: GET [base]/HealthcareService/[id]/_history/vid"
"A Server SHALL be capable of supporting the following _includes: HealthcareService:location - GET [base]/HealthcareService?[parameter=value]&_include=HealthcareService:location"
"A Server SHALL be capable of supporting the following _includes: HealthcareService:coverage-area - GET [base]/HealthcareService?[parameter=value]&_include=HealthcareService:coverage-area"
"A Server SHALL be capable of supporting the following _includes: HealthcareService:organization - GET [base]/HealthcareService?[parameter=value]&_include=HealthcareService:organization"
"A Server SHALL be capable of supporting the following _includes: HealthcareService:endpoint - GET [base]/HealthcareService?[parameter=value]&_include=HealthcareService:endpoint"

"InsurancePlan - Conformance Expectation: SHALL, Supported Profiles: [Plan-Net InsurancePlan](StructureDefinition-plannet-InsurancePlan.html), Reference Policy: resolves, Profile Interaction Summary: SHALL support search-type, read. SHOULD support vread."
"A Server SHOULD be capable of returning a InsurancePlan resource using: GET [base]/InsurancePlan/[id]/_history/vid"
"A Server SHALL be capable of supporting the following _includes: InsurancePlan:administered-by - GET [base]/InsurancePlan?[parameter=value]&_include=InsurancePlan:administered-by"
"A Server SHALL support the search parameter [administered-by] - GET [base]/InsurancePlan?administered-by=[administered-by]"
requirements.source: Search Parameter Summary in FHIR Implementation Guide

requirements.requirement_text: "A Server SHALL support the search parameter [name] - GET [base]/InsurancePlan?name=[name]"
requirements.source: Search Parameter Summary in FHIR Implementation Guide

requirements.requirement_text: "The Server SHALL resolve references according to the Reference Policy: `resolves`"
requirements.source: Location section in FHIR Implementation Guide
requirements.(note: Repeat the above format for each search parameter and _include listed in the Implementation Guide content shared)

requirements.source: FHIR Implementation Guide, Location Search Parameters
FHIR Implementation Guide, Location Search Parameters
FHIR Implementation Guide, Location Search Parameters
FHIR Implementation Guide, Location Search Parameters

requirements.requirement_text: "A Server SHALL be capable of returning a Organization resource using: `GET [base]/Organization/[id]`"
requirements.source: FHIR Implementation Guide, Organization Profile Interaction

requirements.requirement_text: "A Server SHOULD be capable of returning a Organization resource using: `GET [base]/Organization/[id]/_history/vid`"
requirements.source: FHIR Implementation Guide, Organization Profile Interaction

requirements.requirement_text: "A Server SHALL be capable of supporting the following _includes: Organization:partof - `GET [base]/Organization?[parameter=value]&_include=Organization:partof`"
requirements.source: FHIR Implementation Guide, Organization Profile Interaction

requirements.requirement_text: "A Server SHALL be capable of supporting the following _revincludes: Endpoint:organization - `GET [base]/Organization?[parameter=value]&_revinclude=Endpoint:organization`"
requirements.source: FHIR Implementation Guide, Organization Profile Interaction

requirements.requirement_text: "A Server SHOULD be capable of returning a OrganizationAffiliation resource using: GET [base]/OrganizationAffiliation/[id]/_history/vid"
requirements.source: FHIR Implementation Guide, Section: OrganizationAffiliation Resource

requirements.requirement_text: "A Server SHALL be capable of supporting the following _includes: OrganizationAffiliation:primary-organization - GET [base]/OrganizationAffiliation?[parameter=value]&_include=OrganizationAffiliation:primary-organization"
requirements.source: FHIR Implementation Guide, Section: OrganizationAffiliation Resource

requirements.requirement_text: "A Server SHALL support the search parameter primary-organization - GET [base]/OrganizationAffiliation?primary-organization=[primary-organization]"
requirements.source: FHIR Implementation Guide, Search Parameter Summary: OrganizationAffiliation Resource
requirements.note: Follow the same format for all other requirements mentioned in the FHIR Implementation Guide.
